storyInfo: Ebenholz finally gains Czerny's approval. When Czerny goes to the concert hall for a routine pre-concert inspection, he runs into Gertrude by chance.

attributes.content: No good.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: At the triplets... No, throughout this entire piece.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I thought you were trying to show off at first, but after a few sessions, it's clear that you're not. Instead, you're deliberately handling high-difficulty passages with excessive flair as if to obfuscate the less-technical passages.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: In theory, you should already be quite familiar with this piece, so what's the point of fudging the easy sections?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: The point...? To fudge my way out of this rote, mechanical drilling. How's that for an answer?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You've lost your temper?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Showing off? Fudging? Why such loaded words?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The way I see it, I'm wasting time repeating the same piece over and over.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Whether you understand or not doesn't matter to me, but you're going to be playing in MY concert. If I say it's no good, then that means it's no good.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Keep practicing. And don't stop until you understand what I'm talking about.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Fine. I also happen to want to know what manner of unfathomable creature I'm running from.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Start from measure seventeen. One, two, three, four...
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: What was going through your head when you played that passage just now?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Nothing in particular.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Wrong.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You're throwing a fit at me.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: And what warranted you specifically pointing that out to me?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That was the best you've sounded all day.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Are you joking?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Do I need to joke around with you?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: All you can think about right now is how to shut me up, isn't that right?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: That's exactly the way to approach it. When I wrote this piece, I was also thinking of someone who always competes with me.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You're not saying anything, so I assume you're still surly?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Or do you have such a problem with me that you don't want anything to do with me anymore?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: No, I actually thought...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Thought what?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: ‚Äì‚ÄìI thought you had a problem with me.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I do have a problem with you.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You have a problem with me... And is it that I'm a noble?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That is one reason, but not a particularly important one.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: It's true that I do not like nobles, but that does not stop me from applauding their music.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Just as some nobles see me as unclean, but that does not stop them from practicing my compositions at home.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Even the fortunate ones, sheltered and blissfully unaware of the plight of man, with sufficient respect for music and a desire to pursue it, may be found expounding the joys of life.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But your performance is virtuosic at times yet perfunctory at others. Overall, it's as if...
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: One side of you is just trying to kill time while the other half is going to great lengths for embellishments and frills, as if to prove to others that your problem is a matter of motivation rather than capacity.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Let me be clear about this‚Äì this is a form of blasphemy against music, an attitude I absolutely cannot accept.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Fortunately for you, you've already proven to me that you're not doing it on purpose.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: At least, you have the ability to rid yourself of this state.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: What I suspect more now is that you had a talented teacher who was irresponsible toward his students.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Yes, that's exactly the kind of person my teacher was.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Thanks to him, I can perform a few pieces on pretty much every instrument, but I loathe him from the bottom of my heart.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: If that actually is the case, his music must've been quite unusual as well.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You're right about that, but I don't want to talk about him anymore.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: No matter.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Back on topic. I need you to remember how you felt today.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'm not telling you to keep holding your nose while you practice this piece. But I'd like you to remember the rhythms and expressions from this last time, and the way you played those passages and transitions.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Good, let's wrap things up. You must be tired from practicing for so long.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I still need to take a look around the concert hall and meet with my sponsor, so I need to get going soon.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: That's it for today. I'll have Ursula fetch something to drink for you and Kreide.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Ursula‚Äì‚Äì
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Ursula, where are you?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Kreide? Have you seen Ursula?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: She said she was going to Rhodes Island to fetch some medicine, and left about half an hour ago.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Half an hour ago? Their office isn't that far away.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'll head down to the Rhodes Island office to see what's going on. You two can go home.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I was also about to go there to visit my grandpa, so I'll come with you.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Ebenholz, want to join us?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Not like I have anything better to do.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ebenholz, Kreide, and Mr. Czerny too!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You all came at just the right time. I'm cooking up some food. Would you like to join us in a bit?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus, where's Ursula?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Ms. Ursula's helping out in the kitchen‚Äì‚Äì
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Well if it isn't Herr Czerny.
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: Didn't you come here to pick up medicine? How'd you end up cooking?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: That was the plan, but I caught Hibiscus cookin' and Andante went out again. Thought it'd be bad to impose, and offered to lend a hand. Now you're here and that takes care of tonight's dinner as well.
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: Since Ebenholz and Kreide are here too, we need to make extra.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: How about Grandpa's portion?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Your grandpa has been asleep this whole time. I'm afraid he won't be able to join us at the table tonight.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The whole time...? Has his condition worsened?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Don't worry. As far as I can tell, that's a common side effect of the medication, but he'll adjust to it soon enough.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Hibiscus, what's this thing? It looks just like an apple.
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: It's a very nutritious tuber, great for your health. I haven't seasoned it yet though, so hold on a bit.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Weren't you going to go check out the concert hall with your sponsor?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I still have to fill up the tank before I go.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: That sponsor must be very dear to you. Right, Herr Czerny?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Dear, huh... Hah, quite the opposite.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: At first, I truly thought the two of us kindred spirits. But I quickly realized she is not the same kind of person as I.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, your true soul mate was the one intimately connected to 'Morgen und Abend,' only to pass away before you completed that opus.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Now that I think about it more calmly, the reason you rubbed me the wrong way from the very beginning... might have something to do with the way this piece came about.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Hearing you play 'Morgen und Abend' like that filled my heart with some dissatisfaction.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But now that you've seen the light, the stone in my heart has at last been shed.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: It's all thanks to all those hours of intense instruction you provided. Otherwise‚Äì‚ÄìUgh.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I see sarcasm is also one of your bad habits?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Maybe it is.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: It's fine. I don't mind.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: The way I see it, the most important quality a musician can have... is sincerity.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Sarcasm aside, even deeply-rooted hatred, if expressed using the proper techniques, is meaningful all the same.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: The last dish is ready!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If not for Ursula's help, cooking all these dishes would've taken forever.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Eating together makes it feel like we're one big family.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: (Mumbles) Family, huh...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Speaking of family, I wonder how Lava is doing back on the landship...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Lava?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Lava is my sister, and an Infected. She can be a handful at times, but she's a good egg.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Your eyes lighted up when you mentioned your sister, Hibiscus.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Eh, really? Heehee.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Lava's the kind of girl who remembers who's been good to her, even if she's bad at expressing it. She's always getting into trouble.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: She's also Infected, but unlike me, she's really into studying her own Originium Arts. That's why she needs to pay extra attention to her diet.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Plus, she tends to miss meals or stay up too late because of her training, and I always have to remind her‚Äì‚Äì
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh my, I'm sorry. Whenever I talk about Lava, I can't help myself...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The food's going to go cold, so let's dig in! I'm going to go change Kreide's grandpa's bandages first, and then I'll be right back.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: She sure loves her little sister.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That's what siblings are for.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Can't help but wonder at times, if Mein Herr had a brother or sister of his own, maybe he'd be a bit more easygoing.
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: Ursula!
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: Hibiscus, are you done changing his bandages?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I'll be there in a moment‚Äì‚Äì
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Coming, coming! Thanks for waiting!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Now then, don't stand on ceremony, go ahead and dig in!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Here you go, one order of pan-fried sauerkraut!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Finally, something normal to eat.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Wait, huh? You even packed some of her 'health food' to go?!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I must admit the taste was rather odd, but I don't think it's good to waste food.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You can eat that yourself tomorrow!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Care for another bowl of soup, Mein Herr?
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: No thanks... I'm full.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You didn't notice anything off with her cooking, when you were in the kitchen?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Couldn't just go around tasting food, being in someone else's kitchen and all.
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: Besides, she does cook plenty healthy, I could see that much.
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: S'pose I could also learn a thing or two from Hibiscus, change up m'own cookin'...
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: Ah, Mein Herr, I'm just jokin', come back‚Äì‚Äì
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: I'm back!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: How was it? Have you eaten yet? If not‚Äì‚Äì
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: ‚Äì‚ÄìThanks for the offer! But I already ate out!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Aw, I even saved a portion just for you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Sorry for making you do the detective legwork, but it's hard for me to get around right now.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. I'm also a part of the Afterglow. If I can find some way to improve the situation, it'll benefit me just fine.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Now for the data analysis...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I must say, this setup surpasses my expectations.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Far from it, Mein Herr.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: This is your farewell concert after all. If anything, it ought to be more grandiose.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: I was talking about the instruments.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Ah, yes. Dame Gertrude spent a significant amount of money procuring the highest-quality instruments. We've tried our best to meet you and your musicians' needs when it comes to the venue and equipment.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Now that you've had a good look around...
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: If I'm not mistaken, I believe I still haven't seen the lounge?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Ah, look at this sorry memory of mine.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Right this way.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: That's strange, why won't this door open?
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Is there someone inside?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Yes. Someone indeed is inside.
Dame Gertrude?
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Considering the significance of this concert, I am personally inspecting the concert hall's furnishings.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: That you would have to come handle such trivial matters in person means that we have failed in our duties! Sincerest apologies!
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: If I heard right, Herr Czerny is also here?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Yes, I am. What are you doing in there?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'm checking the lounge's interior.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: In my opinion, while the lounge does meet the bare minimum as set by you and your musicians, it leaves much to be desired.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: (Sighs audibly)
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Water stains on the mirrors, rusting on the drawer handles' plating, small holes in the carpet, just to name a few of the problems...
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: I told you before, this concert doesn't need so much pomp and flair. As long as things work, it's good enough.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: That will not do. As your sponsor, my reputation is closely tied to the performance that you and your underlings put on.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: How many times do I have to tell you, they are musicians who've volunteered to play in the concert, not my 'underlings!'
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: There is no difference in the eyes of the people you've invited.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Have it your way.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'll open the door for you now. You're free to inspect the facilities yourself.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Never mind, I'll just leave it in your hands.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Do you not want to come in and take a look?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Not in the slightest, so you can stop putting on airs.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I trust you didn't want to see my face either, right? So let's make things easy for one another.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: (Whispers) Herr Czerny, your tone...
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: This is how we've always talked to each other.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Then run along and do as you please. I'll proceed with the needed inspections here.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: I just hope that these mundane affairs will prove to be a benefit to you on the day of the concert, rather than a hindrance.
attributes.name: Gertrude
